TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventWatcherOptions extends System.Management.ManagementOptions

summary.span: 指定管理事件監看的選項。

span.span: Specifies options for management event watching.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在用戶端接收通知的執行個體時**Win32_Process**因為事件類別是建立 **__InstanceCreationEvent**。The following example shows how the client receives notification when an instance of **Win32_Process** is created because the event class is **__InstanceCreationEvent**. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文件[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。For more information, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library). 用戶端呼叫 方法，就可以同步接收事件。The client receives events synchronously by calling the method. 在範例程式碼執行時，可以透過啟動處理序 (例如，[記事本]) 來測試這個範例。This example can be tested by starting a process, such as Notepad, while the example code is running. [!code-csharp[wminet_EventWatcherOptions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_EventWatcherOptions/cs/EventWatcherOptions.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_EventWatcherOptions#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_EventWatcherOptions/vb/EventWatcherOptions.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，以進行事件監看。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for event watching.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 使用預設值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for event watching, using default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在用戶端接收通知的執行個體時**Win32_Process**因為事件類別是建立 **__InstanceCreationEvent**。The following example shows how the client receives notification when an instance of **Win32_Process** is created because the event class is **__InstanceCreationEvent**. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文件[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。For more information, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library). 用戶端呼叫 方法，就可以同步接收事件。The client receives events synchronously by calling the method. 在範例程式碼執行時，可以透過啟動處理序 (例如，[記事本]) 來測試這個範例。This example can be tested by starting a process, such as Notepad, while the example code is running. MemberSignature.Value: public EventWatcherOptions (System.Management.ManagementNamedValueCollection context, TimeSpan timeout, int blockSize);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Management.ManagementNamedValueCollection context, valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout, int32 blockSize) cil managed
Public Sub New (context As ManagementNamedValueCollection, timeout As TimeSpan, blockSize As Integer)
public: EventWatcherOptions(System::Management::ManagementNamedValueCollection ^ context, TimeSpan timeout, int blockSize);

param.name: context
param.span: 選項內容物件包含要傳送至提供者 (Provider) 的特定提供者資訊。

span.span: The options context object containing provider-specific information to be passed through to the provider.
The time-out to wait for the next events.

param.name: blockSize
param.span: 要等待每個區塊的事件數。

span.span: The number of events to wait for in each block.

summary.span: 使用指定值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the given values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int BlockSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定區塊操作的區塊大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the block size for block operations.

summary.span: 等待事件時，這個值可以指定在傳回前要等待多少事件。

span.span: When waiting for events, this value specifies how many events to wait for before returning.

value.span: 傳回 值，指出作業區塊的區塊大小。

span.span: Returns an value indicating the block size for a block of operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value 預設值為 1。The default value is 1. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在用戶端接收通知的執行個體時**Win32_Process**因為事件類別是建立 **__InstanceCreationEvent**。The following example shows how the client receives notification when an instance of **Win32_Process** is created because the event class is **__InstanceCreationEvent**. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文件[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。For more information, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library). 用戶端呼叫 方法，就可以同步接收事件。The client receives events synchronously by calling the method. 在範例程式碼執行時，可以透過啟動處理序 (例如，[記事本]) 來測試這個範例。This example can be tested by starting a process, such as Notepad, while the example code is running.
